revoke.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to officially state that a law, decision, or agreement is no longer effective
revoke.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Their work permits have been revoked.
revoke.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to officially state that a law, official document, agreement etc is no longer effective
revoke.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: We had no alternative but to revoke the contract.
